alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:18AM CDT until June 15 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Northern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 118 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmhaven, or 13 miles west of Carthage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carthage and Redwater around 135 AM CDT. Tuscola around 140 AM CDT. Walnut Grove and Standing Pine around 145 AM CDT. Madden and Dowdville around 155 AM CDT. Prospect around 200 AM CDT. Dixon around 205 AM CDT. Union and Neshoba around 210 AM CDT. Tucker around 215 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
